name: The Groggers
description:
'''The Groggers''' is an American [[Jewish rock|Jewish]] [[pop punk]] band from [[Queens]], [[New York (state)|New York]]. Formed in 2010 by lead singer [[L.E. Doug Staiman]], they are known for their satirical, often controversial songs dealing with a variety of Jewish issues. 

Initially gaining fame with their single and music video "[[Get (song)|Get]]", the band released their debut album, ''[[There's No 'I' in Cherem]]'', on August 29, 2011. They received national attention, as well as controversy, with their 2012 video for "[[Jewcan Sam]]", produced with plastic surgeon Dr. [[Michael Salzhauer]].
